name: I Will Be Happy (LD32)
description:
Everyone in the city is downbeat and broken down by the monotony of daily life. Armed with nothing but friendship, it's up to you to cheer up the locals by shooting them with hugs, good vibes, and friendship!

In this shoot-em-up, rack up a high score before the local people manage to bring you down.

This was my entry for Ludum Dare 32. I think it got somewhere in the vicinity of 120th in the compo overall?
